title: 2021), following consultation with the Minister for Education, hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Child and Family Agency (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Child and Family Agency (Amendment) 

Act 2021 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited child family agency (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2021

title: 2021), following consultation with the Minister for Education, hereby order as
heading: 2. The 15th day of December 2021 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 15th day of December 2021 is appointed as the day on which the 
Child and Family Agency (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 34 of 2021) shall come 
into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 December, 2021. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [697] 3
